summary: Timeline_5 follows a journey through PTSD treatment with increasing use of coping strategies.

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. I'm a burden to everyone I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I'm completely numb But I've been practicing the breathing exercises reached out for help and it's starting to help. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel like such a failure. Nothing will ever get better Can't stop thinking about hurting myself. I haven't showered in a week But I remembered my safety plan tried a new coping mechanism and texted my sponsor. I'm not giving up
maladaptive_evidence: I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The urges to self-harm are strong. Nothing will ever get better I haven't showered in a week Using the distraction techniques I learned. went for a walk to clear my head Reached out to my crisis support instead. I'm being patient with myself
adaptive_evidence: went for a walk to clear my head
maladaptive_evidence: I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Feel like I don't deserve to be loved. I deserve to suffer I gave up trying My partner has been incredibly supportive. took my medication as prescribed Learning to accept help and love. I'm learning to be kinder to myself
adaptive_evidence: I'm learning to be kinder to myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. Life is meaningless I'm worthless. I gave up trying Did one small thing today - made my bed. called the crisis hotline Trying to celebrate tiny victories. I acknowledge my progress
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. I'm broken beyond repair I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I pushed everyone away But I've been practicing the breathing exercises talked to a friend about what I'm going through and it's starting to help. I deserve to get better
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel like such a failure. I can't do anything right Can't stop thinking about hurting myself. I stopped taking my medication But I remembered my safety plan wrote in my journal and texted my sponsor. I'm learning healthier coping skills
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels impossible. Nothing will ever get better I'm worthless. I'm losing my mind Did one small thing today - made my bed. tried a new coping mechanism Trying to celebrate tiny victories. I'm being patient with myself
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Side effects are awful. I feel completely hopeless I've been having suicidal thoughts Sticking with it because my doctor said it takes time. practiced my coping strategies Noticing small improvements in my mood. I'm committed to my recovery
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My partner and I have been fighting constantly. I'm broken beyond repair I feel like I'm ruining everything. I hurt myself again We decided to try couples therapy. took my medication as prescribed Had our first session and it went better than expected. I'm working on self-compassion
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been struggling with depression for weeks now. I want to give up on everything I'm losing my mind But yesterday I finally did some self-care activities and scheduled an appointment. I acknowledge my progress
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Everything feels hopeless lately. I'm tired of existing I can barely get myself out of bed most days. I pushed everyone away Today though, I managed to talked to a friend about what I'm going through which is a small victory.
adaptive_evidence: talked to a friend about what I'm going through
posts.summary: Post primarily shows distress with some coping attempts

posts.text: Everything feels hopeless lately. I can't do anything right I can barely get myself out of bed most days. I'm losing my mind Today though, I managed to tried a new coping mechanism which is a small victory.
posts.summary: Post primarily shows distress with some coping attempts
